data.name: Train Simulator: Midland Main Line: Leicester - Derby & Nottingham Route Add-On
data.detailed_description:
Featured DLC

https://store.steampowered.com/app/277760
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1429751


About the Game

From the quaint countryside to the towering Ratcliffe Power Station, explore the sights of the East Midlands with Just Trains’ authentic Midland Main Line: Leicester - Derby & Nottingham route.

Dating back to the 1840s, the Midland Main Line is a key passenger and freight route which links London to the East Midlands, and en route passes through the once-industrial Leicester, which has been connected to the rest of England by transport links since the days of the Old Grand Union Canal, and onwards up to Nottingham of similarly industrial fame, as well as Derby, where trains have been built for the past 180 years.

Today the line sees dozens of trains a day, rushing commuters into South and North of England, and allowing people easy access to the culture and vibrancy of the Midlands.

Just Trains have faithfully recreated the 36-mile section between Leicester, Derby & Nottingham, featuring accurately detailed stations along the way and lush green countryside in-between. Race through the hills on inter-city and local passenger services, and take charge of freight trains on their way across the nation.

Included Scenarios


A selection of Standard scenarios are included:

  • 1C67 17:00 Sheffield-St Pancras
  • 2L77 16:30 Leicester-Lincoln
  • 5B41 Derby-Nottingham/1D21 Nottingham-St Pancras
  • 5L10 Leicester-Loughborough/2L10 Loughborough-Leicester
  • 1M84 18:45 Cardiff-Nottingham/5M84 Nottingham-Leicester
  • 6M04 06:45 Humber International Coal Terminal-Ratcliffe P.S
  • 1B28 09:45 Nottingham-St Pancras International
  • 1V09 12:07 Nottingham-Cardiff
  • The Robin Hood
  • (1995): 1F62 St Pancras-Derby
  • 1D07 07:04 St Pancras-Nottingham
  • 2A95 17:52 Derby-Nottingham

More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!

Click here for Steam Workshop scenarios.

Key Features


  • 36-mile route from Leicester to Derby and Nottingham
  • 12 accurately detailed stations
  • Includes Derby Rail Technical Centre, Toton Depot & Ratcliffe Power Station
  • Numerous landmark buildings throughout
  • A selection of Standard scenarios
  • Quick Drive Compatible
  • Includes the European Loco & Asset Pack
  • Download size: 460.7mb

data.short_description: From the quaint countryside to the towering Ratcliffe Power Station, explore the sights of the East Midlands with Just Trains’ authentic Midland Main Line: Leicester - Derby & Nottingham route.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator 2019 User Guide.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended for 32-bit:
  • OS: 32- or 64-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 4690 3.50 GHz Quad Core or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 3.80 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM (maximum possible under 32-bit Windows)/16 GB or Better (For 64-bit Windows)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 4 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: High Performance SSD Recommended with 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator 2019 User Guide.
